commands.name: az networkfabric device list
commands.summary: List all Network Devices in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkfabric device run-ro
commands.summary: Run the RO Command on the Network Device.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric device run-ro [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--resource-name]
                               [--ro-command]
                               [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric device run-rw
commands.summary: Run the RW Command on the Network Device.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric device run-rw [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--resource-name]
                               [--rw-command]
                               [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric device show
commands.summary: Show details of the provided Network Device resource.

commands.name: az networkfabric device update
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric device update [--annotation]
                               [--host-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--resource-name]
                               [--serial-number]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric device update-admin-state
commands.summary: Updates the Administrative state of the Network Device.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric device update-admin-state [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--resource-ids]
                                           [--resource-name]
                                           [--state {Enable, GracefulQuarantine, Quarantine, RMA, Resync, UnderMaintenance}]
                                           [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric device upgrade
commands.summary: Upgrades the version of the Network Device.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric device upgrade [--ids]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--resource-name]
                                [--subscription]
                                [--version]

commands.name: az networkfabric device wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
